data.actual_result: The app lets you submit it, and that will create a channel that nobody can see, except for admins/owner. This means that if you don't have Administrator privileges, you won't even be able to see the channel you just created.
data.expected_result: As on Desktop, you shouldn't even be able to submit the channel creation until you select at least 1 role
data.short_description: Creating a private channel without selecting any role will create a channel that nobody can access, not even yourself (unless you have full admin privileges)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go in a server you have permission to create text channels, preferably without Administrator permission- Open the menu to create a new channel - Enable "Private channel" - Without selecting any role, tap the checkmark to submit channel creation
